name: Guarded
description:
Guarded is game about dodging within four lanes, as well as blocking at the right time.

Just until you find an opening to blast away your enemies using your handy portable cannon.

Features:

3 main levels

Attacks change as you progress through the fight

Cute protagonist

Controls:

Arrow keys to move left and right, press down to block attacks

Space to fire your cannon

Esc to Quit

First game I've ever created, feel free to give any advice.
